subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: In the 1970s, ’80s and early ’90s, Swedish men won dozens of Grand Slam events, behind only the Americans. But there has been only one such victory in the last 21 years.
snippet: In the 1970s, ’80s and early ’90s, Swedish men won dozens of Grand Slam events, behind only the Americans. But there has been only one such victory in the last 21 years.
